General.Name: FibraHotel
General.Description: FibraHotel is a Mexican trust created primarily to acquire, develop and operate hotels in Mexico. Our objective is to provide attractive returns to our CBFI holders through distributions and the appreciation of our real estate assets. Also, we will aim to have a high quality hotel portfolio, through the affiliation to different hotel brands and renowned operators, as well as geographic and segment diversification.
General.Address: Torre Corporativo World Plaza, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 5349
